Connection Management Procedures (CMP)
[Core Modules]

Detailed Description

This module implements the connection management procedures defined in IEC 61883-1.

This module can be used from the command prompt by the cli_cmp commands.

The following registers are implemented:

  • iPCR
  • oPCR
  • iMPR
  • oMPR

This module instantiates these registers and respond to lock transactions at the register addresses.


Modules

 CMP Initialization
 Initialization of the CMP Module.
 CMP Broadcast Connection
 This module implements the connection management procedures for broadcast connections.
 CMP Point-to-Point Connections
 This module implements the connection management procedures for point-to-point connections.

Functions

HRESULT cmpCB (PB *packetBlock)
 Callback for lock transactions addressed to the PCR registers (offsets F000 0900 through F000 09FC).

Function Documentation

Callback for lock transactions addressed to the PCR registers (offsets F000 0900 through F000 09FC).
